title: Growing Basil Indoors
description: Learn how to grow fresh basil in pots on your kitchen windowsill.
steps: Choose a sunny windowsill with 6+ hours of light
Keep soil slightly moist but not soggy
Pinch back top leaves regularly to encourage bushy growth
tips: Avoid letting basil flower—pinch off buds
Harvest leaves from the top down
Basil thrives in warmth, avoid cold drafts

title: Caring for Mint
description: Keep your mint plant healthy and prevent it from taking over your garden.
steps: Plant in containers to control spread
Provide partial shade and moist soil
Trim frequently to encourage new growth

title: Thyme for Beginners
description: Learn to grow and care for thyme in containers or garden beds.
steps: Choose full sun and well-draining soil
Water only when soil is dry
tips: Use in soups and roasted veggies

title: Parsley Growth Guide
description: Grow lush parsley for your kitchen easily with these tips.
steps: Sow seeds in rich, moist soil
Place in partial sun or filtered light

title: Cilantro Success
description: Get the most out of cilantro before it bolts in summer heat.
steps: Keep soil moist but not soggy
tips: Coriander seeds come from the same plant
Best grown in early spring or fall

title: Oregano Maintenance
description: Tips to keep your oregano bushy and aromatic.
steps: Prune regularly to encourage new shoots
tips: Intensifies in flavor as it dries

title: Chives Made Easy
description: Grow chives to add onion-like flavor to your dishes.
steps: Plant in full sun with moist soil
Cut near soil level when harvesting
Remove flower heads to prevent seeding
tips: Great garnish for eggs and soups

title: Sage Planting Guide
description: Learn how to grow sage with this easy-care routine.
steps: Allow soil to dry between watering
Trim in spring to promote fresh growth

title: Lavender Love
description: Get tips on growing fragrant lavender plants for home and tea.
steps: Plant in sandy soil with good drainage
tips: Too much water causes root rot

title: Dill Growth Guide
description: Grow dill for pickling, soups, and seasoning.
steps: Needs full sun and consistent moisture

title: Tarragon Tips
description: Grow French tarragon for a licorice-like flavor in dishes.
steps: Prefers full sun and loose soil
Water when top inch is dry

title: Lemongrass Propagation
description: Grow lemongrass from stalks for teas and Asian cuisine.
steps: Plant in large pot with moist soil

title: Bay Leaf Tree Basics
description: Grow a bay laurel tree for culinary use year-round.
steps: Needs bright light and good drainage
tips: Use dried leaves in soups and stews

title: Fenugreek Microgreens
description: Quickly grow fenugreek microgreens at home.
steps: Spread in a tray with moist paper

title: Growing Stevia
description: Grow your own calorie-free sweetener with stevia.
tips: Use dried leaves in tea or baking
